Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent aspects of employment including occupation and employment status. This vocabulary uses distinct sub-sets of codes.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK EmploymentStatus subset with subset original id 6921000000134.

Description.p:
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Occupation subset with subset original id 6661000000133.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
